name: dpkg::control::changelog
body:
Dpkg::Control::Changelog

NAME

Dpkg::Control::Changelog - represent info fields output by dpkg-parsechangelog

DESCRIPTION

This class derives directly from Dpkg::Control with the type CTRL_CHANGELOG.

METHODS

$c = Dpkg::Control::Changelog->new()

Create a new empty set of changelog related fields.

CHANGES

Version 1.00 (dpkg 1.15.6)
Mark the module as public.
